message.content: {"given_definition_quality":75,"better_definition":"this side, here","sentence":"这边有水果。","image_prompt":"soft apocalypse animation, a table or surface on this side of the viewer, with several pieces of fruit (like apples and bananas) resting on it, shown in a bright, slightly surreal animated style. in the background, a gentle post-apocalypse landscape with faded city silhouettes and soft clouds. the focus is on the fruit on this side, with light falling on them to emphasize 'here/this side'.","sentence_translation":"There is fruit on this side."}
